replyContent: The app should only be used on one phone. If an App user has tested positive and the result has been recorded within the App, other users who have had close contact, whilst both users have had the App installed and Bluetooth contact tracing enabled will be notified. Find out more here: https://faq.covid19.nhs.uk/article/KA-01125/en-us
